prompts: Create a Pokemon that looks like a tree but can move and fight.
Generate a quirky Pokemon inspired by nature with unique wooden features.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a forest with green accents.
Design a creature that resembles a wooden figure with playful characteristics.
Imagine a Pokemon with a trunk-like body and round green leaves as arms.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that blends in with trees and can surprise its foes.
Give me a Pokemon that has a sturdy appearance but a playful personality.
